bui-array-index
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], index = bui.array.index("a", arr);
template.description: 检测字符是否存在数组,返回索引

template.name: bui-array-indexs
template.value: var arr = ["a","b","a"], index = bui.array.indexs("a", arr);
template.description: 检测字符是否存在数组,返回所有索引的数组

template.name: bui-array-compare
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], index = bui.array.compare(a, arr);
template.description: 检测字符是否存在数组,返回布尔值

template.name: bui-array-excess
template.value: var arr = ["a","b","a","c"], newArr = bui.array.excess("a", arr);
template.description: 去除数组的重复值,返回数组

template.name: bui-array-filter
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], data = bui.array.filter("a",arr);
template.description: 过滤数组,返回符合条件的数组

template.name: bui-array-remove
template.value: var arr = ["a","b"], data = bui.array.remove("a", arr);
template.description: 删除数组的某个值,返回剩下的数组
